nodes.text: A Human male Dark Jedi Master served the Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Malak's Sith Empire during the Jedi Civil War. During the war's final battle, the Dark Jedi was stationed aboard the Star Forge, the ancient Rakatan space station under Malak's control which fueled the Empire's war effort. He monitored the former Dark Lord and redeemed Jedi Revan aboard the Star Forge during the battle, and reported to Malak on Revan's progress.
The Dark Jedi Master was featured in the 2003 Xbox and PC video game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic.
